sentence.Network_en: Coconut milk has little nutritive value.
sentence.Network_cn: 椰子汁没什么营养价值。

sentence.Network_en: Much of the really nutritive material actually was refined out of food.
sentence.Network_cn: 大部分真正有营养价值的物质实际上已从食物中提炼出来.

sentence.Network_en: Now the nutritive value of the forage is reduced.
sentence.Network_cn: 此时牧草的营养价值也下降了.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from medieval Latin nutritivus, from nutrire 'feed, nourish'

entry.def: The nutritive content of food is all the substances that are in it which help you to remain healthy.

example.ex: Coconut milk has little nutritive value.
example.tran: 椰子汁没什么营养价值。

auth_sentence.content: In this form it is both nutritive and wholesome, being more easily digested than sweet milk.
